files.patch:
@@ -577,10 +577,12 @@
-  $(eval $(call SetupTarget, build-hsdis, \
-      MAKEFILE := Hsdis, \
-      TARGET := build, \
-  ))
-
-  $(eval $(call SetupTarget, install-hsdis, \
-      MAKEFILE := Hsdis, \
-      TARGET := install, \
-      DEPS := jdk-image, \
-  ))
+  ifneq ($(CREATING_BUILDJDK), true)
+    $(eval $(call SetupTarget, build-hsdis, \
+        MAKEFILE := Hsdis, \
+        TARGET := build, \
+    ))
+
+    $(eval $(call SetupTarget, install-hsdis, \
+        MAKEFILE := Hsdis, \
+        TARGET := install, \
+        DEPS := jdk-image, \
+    ))
+  endif
@@ -929,1 +931,3 @@
-    java.base-copy: build-hsdis
+    ifneq ($(CREATING_BUILDJDK), true)
+        java.base-copy: build-hsdis
+    endif

@@ -253,9 +253,10 @@
-  HSDIS_NAME := hsdis-$(OPENJDK_TARGET_CPU_LEGACY_LIB)$(SHARED_LIBRARY_SUFFIX)
-  HSDIS_PATH := $(SUPPORT_OUTPUTDIR)/hsdis/$(HSDIS_NAME)
-
-  $(eval $(call SetupCopyFiles, COPY_HSDIS, \
-      FILES := $(HSDIS_PATH), \
-      DEST := $(call FindLibDirForModule, $(MODULE)), \
-      FLATTEN := true, \
-      MACRO := install-file-nolink, \
-  ))
+  ifneq ($(CREATING_BUILDJDK), true)
+    HSDIS_NAME := hsdis-$(OPENJDK_TARGET_CPU_LEGACY_LIB)$(SHARED_LIBRARY_SUFFIX)
+    HSDIS_PATH := $(SUPPORT_OUTPUTDIR)/hsdis/$(HSDIS_NAME)
+
+    $(eval $(call SetupCopyFiles, COPY_HSDIS, \
+        FILES := $(HSDIS_PATH), \
+        DEST := $(call FindLibDirForModule, $(MODULE)), \
+        FLATTEN := true, \
+        MACRO := install-file-nolink, \
+    ))
@@ -263,1 +264,2 @@
-  TARGETS += $(COPY_HSDIS)
+    TARGETS += $(COPY_HSDIS)
+  endif
